sentence.Network_en: Hubby, if I am with child, what should we do?
sentence.Network_cn: 老公啊, 那假如有孩子了怎么办?

sentence.Network_en: When will I quit calling ? B : Maybe wait till my hubby comes home.
sentence.Network_cn: a:什么时候不打了? B: 等老公回来吧.

sentence.Network_en: Hubby, forgive me . Since, i only laugh at the heaven for you!
sentence.Network_cn: 老公, 原谅我, 以后只能在天上笑给你听了!

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《Friends》词汇表B ... divorcing n. 离婚, 脱离 hubby n. 丈夫 mustache n. 髭, 胡子.
记：你个女称男友做老公（hubby）喎，系咪准备结婚？林：（反应甚大）唔系亲昵就要结婚？

list.abs: one day , his wife came in to the kitchen to find her hubby drawing hundreds of alien-like faces with mouths agape .一天，他的妻子走进厨房，发现丈夫画了数百张大张着嘴好似外星人的面孔。
hey ! look what i brought my new hubby ., 看我带了什么给我的新老公.
For three days , hubby did not return home , not even a phone call ., 在三天的时间 , 丈夫没有回家 , 甚至没有一个电话.
网聊天略-英语文章阅读-大耳朵英语 -... ... aol=always off line 不在上 dh=dear hubby 的老公 atst=at the same time 与此同.
网络聊天缩略语_小颖_新浪博客 ... aol=always off line 总不在在线 dh=dear hubby 亲爱的老公 atst=at the same time 与此同时.

entry.def: You can refer to a woman's husband as her hubby .

example.ex: Women in the North complain that their hubbies find it difficult to say 'I love you.'
example.tran: 北部的妇女抱怨说她们的丈夫很难开口说“我爱你”。

means.word_mean: 1. a married man; a woman's partner in marriage
